tasks.task: Rice farming and agricultural assistance in Laos
subtasks: Planting rice seeds
Caring for rice fields (irrigation)
Managing drought and flooding
Harvesting rice
Rice breeding and variety improvement
Training farmers in new agronomy practices
Preserving traditional rice varieties
Establishing rice banks and gene conservation
Overcoming challenges in upland farming environments

tasks.task: Rice farming and agricultural assistance in Laos
Rice farming and agricultural assistance in Laos
Rice farming and agricultural assistance in Laos
subtasks: Planting rice seeds for subsistence (since it's the main livelihood)
Managing waterlogged and drought-prone rice fields (irrigation and drought resistance)
Implementing new rice varieties (LMV) and traditional varieties conservation
Training farmers in modern farming techniques and agronomy
Preserving traditional rice species in gene banks
Adapting farming practices for mountainous terrain (e.g., terracing)

tasks.task: Rice farming in Lao PDR
subtasks: Planting and nurturing rice fields
Managing water in rice fields (irrigation, flood control)
Breeding and introducing new rice varieties (LMV)
Training local farmers in modern agronomy
Preserving traditional rice varieties through gene banking

tasks.task: Rice farming and agricultural assistance in Lao PDR
Rice farming and agricultural assistance in Lao PDR
Rice farming and agricultural assistance in Lao PDR
subtasks: Planting and nurturing rice fields (sowing, weed control, fertilization, irrigation, pest/disease management, harvesting)
Introducing and managing new rice varieties (breeding, testing, seed distribution)
Preserving traditional rice varieties in gene banks (collections, evaluation, promotion)
Training farmers in modern agronomy (English, reports, field techniques)
Adapting farming practices to upland environments (terracing, soil and water management)
Ensuring food security through increased yields and growing seasons (possibly multiple cropping)
Maintaining the Lao Gin Bank in Napaq village (preserving accessions, data collection)
